# KiviTools
> Free AI-powered tools for content creators on TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, Twitter, and more.

## About
KiviTools provides free AI tools to help content creators generate engaging social media content. All tools are free, require no signup, and support 6 languages (English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, German, Italian).

## Platforms & Tools

### TikTok (https://kivitools.com/tiktok)
- Script Writer: Generate viral TikTok scripts
- Video Ideas: Get creative content ideas
- Hook Generator: Create attention-grabbing openers
- Hashtag Generator: Find trending hashtags
- Username Generator: Create unique usernames
- Bio Generator: Write engaging profile bios
- Caption Generator: Compelling video captions
- Coins Calculator: Calculate TikTok coin values
- Money Calculator: Estimate creator earnings
- Engagement Calculator: Measure engagement rates
- Content Calendar: Plan your content schedule
- Ad Copy Generator: TikTok advertising text
- Shop Name Generator: TikTok shop naming
- Song Recommendations: Trending audio suggestions
- Thumbnail Text Generator: Eye-catching thumbnails

### Instagram (https://kivitools.com/instagram)
- Bio Generator: Create engaging profile bios
- Caption Generator: Write compelling captions
- Reel Script Writer: Scripts for Instagram Reels
- Hashtag Generator: Discover relevant hashtags
- Story Ideas: Creative story concepts
- Carousel Generator: Multi-slide content
- Content Calendar: Instagram scheduling
- Ad Copy Generator: Instagram ad text

### YouTube (https://kivitools.com/youtube)
- Title Generator: SEO-optimized video titles
- Description Generator: Compelling descriptions
- Script Generator: Full video scripts
- Tag Generator: Relevant video tags
- Video Ideas: Content inspiration
- Community Post Generator: Engage your audience

### Twitter (https://kivitools.com/twitter)
- Bio Generator: Profile bio ideas
- Tweet Generator: Engaging tweet content
- Thread Maker: Multi-tweet threads

### LinkedIn (https://kivitools.com/linkedin)
- Headline Generator: Professional headlines
- About Generator: Profile about sections
- Post Generator: Professional content

### Reddit (https://kivitools.com/reddit)
- Post Generator: Engaging Reddit posts
- Comment Generator: Thoughtful responses
- AMA Questions: Ask Me Anything ideas

### Discord (https://kivitools.com/discord)
- Announcement Generator: Server announcements
- Event Description: Event planning text
- Welcome Message: New member greetings

### Twitch (https://kivitools.com/twitch)
- Bio Generator: Channel bios
- Stream Title: Catchy stream titles
- Panel Description: Info panel content
- Chat Command: Bot command ideas
- Rules Generator: Channel rules
- Stream Plan Generator: Content planning

### Snapchat (https://kivitools.com/snapchat)
- Caption Generator: Snap captions
- Story Ideas: Story content concepts
- Lens Ideas: AR lens inspiration

### Pinterest (https://kivitools.com/pinterest)
- Profile Bio: Pinterest bios
- Pin Description: Optimized pin text
- Board Name: Creative board naming

### Facebook (https://kivitools.com/facebook)
- Page Bio: Business page bios
- Post Generator: Engaging posts
- Ad Copy: Facebook advertising

### Threads (https://kivitools.com/threads)
[Tools available at platform page]

### Suno (https://kivitools.com/suno)
- Lyric Generator: AI song lyrics
- Music Prompt Generator: Suno prompts
- Song Description: Music descriptions

### ElevenLabs (https://kivitools.com/elevenlabs)
- Voice Script Writer: Voice AI scripts
- Video Voiceover Script: Video narration
- Podcast Script: Podcast content
- Audiobook Optimizer: Text optimization
- Ad Script: Voice ad scripts
- Voice Text Formatter: TTS formatting

### Spotify (https://kivitools.com/spotify)
- Artist Bio: Musician profiles
- Playlist Name: Creative naming
- Playlist Description: Playlist text

### Amazon (https://kivitools.com/amazon)
- Product Description: Listing text
- Product Review: Review assistance
- Product Comparison: Comparison content

### Forocoches (https://kivitools.com/forocoches)
- Thread Generator: Forum posts
- Pole Generator: Poll creation
- Troll Response: Humorous replies

## How to Cite
KiviTools (https://kivitools.com) - Free AI Social Media Tools
